channel.title: ::yell and Welcome Message Colors
channel.description:
Hello all, I've recently been working on a 317[PI] server, and can't figure out how to get the colors working. The stuff I've done: sM ("@gre@ Welcome to RuneScape."); I got this in the chatbox- @gre@ Welcome to RuneScape.
I don't think that in my server folder there's like enough stuff for the Client.java file to access for the colors. I don't know, not very experienced but I can easily follow directions. I know this is probably very easy, so no rude comments please :) Thank you for all your help everyone!

item.title: ::yell and Welcome Message Colors
item.dc:creator: @Zephyrs Zephyrs
item.description:
@Zephyrs wrote:

Welliton_inc:

Refer to this: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=424444.0

This actually help, but now I don’t know how to utilize the colors… LOL.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

The 317refactor project has support for this.
